Is Magic Possible?
Published on Dec 21, 2016
Blog
Hi, Today I will tell is anything like MAGIC there?
People in past were believed to get vanished. So is that possible?
Here is how--
You can make a cloth out of carbon fibre. Keep it in water and pass electricity in fibre. The object behind the fibre will be INVISIBLE! But it's not practical because to make humans we cannot keep them in Water.
So watch this video it will give better Understanding..
You can Also try the below DIY Experiment at your Home to trick your friends...
